text: The Ahja () is a river in Estonia. The river is long. The river begins at Lake Erastvere and empties into the River Emajõgi. == Photos == File:Ahja_jõgi,_Läänistel,_2008.jpg|The Ahja in Lääniste in 2008 File:Ahja_river,_Valgemetsa.JPG|The Ahja near Valgemetsa File:Kiidjärve_vesiveski.jpg|Kiidjärve watermill, built in 1914 File:Väike_Taevaskoda_2011.jpg|Taevaskoja File:Talv_Väike- Taevaskojas.jpg|Winter in 2016 Category:Rivers of Estonia
title: Ahja (river)
